channel.title: NPC question
channel.description:
How come when I spawn an npc, it goes away after i turn of the server? Abd how come when i spawn an npc it has 0 hp?
Can someone please answer my questions[br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2007, 10:11:55 PM[/size][hr]I really wanna know these answers please!!!!!!!@@@@@@#@#@#@#

item.title: NPC question
item.dc:creator: @firedude076 firedude076
item.description:
@firedude076 wrote:

[quote=“X SNIPER STUD X, post:1, topic:54545”]How come when I spawn an npc, it goes away after i turn of the server? Abd how come when i spawn an npc it has 0 hp?

Can someone please answer my questions[br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2007, 10:11:55 PM[/size][hr]I really wanna know these answers please!!!@@@@@@#@#@#@#[/quote]

To make an npc stay forever, you have to add it in autospawn.cfg.

To change an npc’s health you have to edit it in npc.cfg.

Read full topic
